name: Constellation (Samet Zengin)
description:
Once upon a time, the Cosmos was splendid and gorgeous. Everything was warm and bright down to the last tiniest corner. Time passed, centruies went forward and everything slowly embraced the silence while all the stars going dark one by one.

When the last star lost its shining, Cosmos shrouded in darkness.

He had only one mission in this silent, lifeless and eternal Cosmos. Rekindling the cold and dark stars to rebuild the Magnificent Constellations that are the Roots of the Cosmos. Like he did before ...
